articles.title: Many Literary Works Created
articles.content:
Many Literary Works Created
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Many literary works including dozens of full-length novels and medium-length stories, epics and long poems have been created by writers of the DPRK up to now since the outset of the year.
					 The full-length novels "Groundwork for Happiness" and "Shining Dawn" are very popular among the readers as they make a truthful and unique depiction of the noble ideological and moral qualities of the people in the era of Songun.
					
					 Full-length novels "The Great Bear" and "Annual Rings" and medium-length stories "Warm Spring Scenery" and "Shallow Well" and other works are also popular among the readers as they make a profound philosophical portrayal of people's life under socialism.
					
					 Epics, a long poem and other works emphasize the truth that the history of President Kim Il Sung is given steady continuity and a thriving socialist nation is sure to emerge on this land thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Among the newly created works are literary works of diverse themes and genres such as full-length historical story "Mun Ik Jom" and a long juvenile story "Lark Reporter's Notes on His Experiences."

articles.title: Ferment Accelerant "Chongcho"
articles.content:
Ferment Accelerant "Chongcho"
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- "Chongcho", ferment facilitative fungus, developed by researchers of the Branch Academy of Biology under the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK has been introduced to stock breeding field to pay off.
					"Chongcho", which can raise the weight increment rate of domestic animals by over 20 percent, is fungus complex with peculiar capability of creating various kinds of physiological activators such as vitamin-B complex including B12 and digestive enzymes.
					
					The fodder mixed with the accelerant helps digestion and absorption of animals and promotes their metabolism.
					
					"Chongcho" with sterilization ability is economically profitable because it is possible to feed animals on the fodder treated with it without boiling.
					
					The accelerant also improves immunity of domestic animals to protect them from taking various kinds of diseases including diarrhea and prevents fodder from being decomposed.
					
					"Chongcho" thus lowers production costs and increases profits.

articles.title: Songun Revolutionary Cause Originated from DIU
articles.content:
Songun Revolutionary Cause Originated from DIU
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The Korean revolution is a sacred one which was pioneered and has advanced under the banner of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					In the 1920s when the national liberation movement of Korea was undergoing bitter twists and turns, President Kim Il Sung formed the DIU on October 17, 1926 with a firm belief that the enemy armed to the teeth could be beat down only with arms.
					
					The formation of the DIU provided the root of the Workers' Party of Korea and marked the start of the Songun revolution.
					
					The DIU was the first revolutionary vanguard organization which embodied his idea of giving importance to arms and its programme was the starting-basis of the Songun revolutionary cause which provided the fundamental idea and principle of the armed revolution.
					
					Having inherited the idea of armed resistance and two pistols from his father, the President hardened the revolutionary will to save the destiny of the country and nation by dint of arms. He declared a life-and-death struggle against the imperialists by forming the DIU.
					
					The formation of the DIU was the first step for accomplishing the historical cause of carrying the Juche-oriented idea of giving importance to arms into practice and the first preparatory stage for organizing a revolutionary armed unit.
					
					In accordance with the completion of the preparatory work for armed struggle beginning from the DIU, the President set forth the line of armed struggle, the strategic one of the Korean revolution, in the Kalun meeting and founded the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army in April of Juche 21 (1932), thus opening up the great history of the Songun revolution.
					
					The socialist idea set forth by the DIU serves as the fundamental one of the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche and its principle of independence, anti-imperialism and continued revolution as the basic one which firmly guarantees the final victory of the revolution.
					
					The history of the WPK which has covered the road of independence and prosperity is the course of practical struggle for realizing the idea and principle of the DIU under the banner of Songun and all the victory and successes gained in this course are a precious fruition of the idea.
					
					The DIU indicated the path to sovereignty, independence and prosperity of the country and nation with the idea of giving priority to the arms, the first of its kind in the accomplishment of the people's cause of independence. The Korean people have applied it to practice, thus creating a new history to build great, prosperous and powerful socialist country in this land shining with Songun politics. The exploits of the DIU will shine forever in the history of the country.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Seeking Monopoly of Space
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Seeking Monopoly of Space
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- It was reported that the two military satellites launched by the United States recently would provide its missile shield with the capability for tracking ballistic missiles worldwide and information transmitted by the sensors of the satellites would be used by the U.S forces for intercepting missiles. 
					Minju Joson Friday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					This goes to prove that the U.S. strategic scenario to get a monopoly of space in a bid to establish military hegemony and put the world under its domination by force of arms has entered the phase of its implementation. 
					
					To this end the U.S. is making much fuss about "missile threat" from someone in an effort to use this as a pretext for deploying a missile shield in space. 
					
					It is the calculation of the U.S. that by unilaterally rounding off and expanding the missile defence system without let-up it will be able to neutralize other powers' retaliatory capabilities and other means and reinforce its military hegemony.
					
					The U.S. is, at the same time, openly deploying a missile shield in space under its military scenario and stepping up the development of satellites equipped with interceptor missiles in real earnest.
					
					The arms race sparked by the U.S. through its launch of the military satellites at a time when the world is making positive efforts to create a peaceful environment cannot be interpreted otherwise than a blatant challenge to humankind's desire for peace and a criminal act of seriously threatening and wrecking the global peace and security.
					
					The U.S. is seeking not global peace and security but aggression, war and showdown of strength.
					
					With nothing can the U.S. justify its policy of arms race and moves for a war of aggression.

articles.title: Anniversary of Oct. Resistance in S. Korea Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Oct. Resistance in S. Korea Observed
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The October resistance for democracy was just one to put an end to the dictatorial rule of foreign forces and their stooges and bring about independent and democratic new politics and life.
					Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article carried 30 years since youth and students and other people in south Korea rose in the above-said resistance. 
					
					It goes on:
					
					The resistance proved the truth of history that nothing can hold in check the just struggle of the popular masses for new politics, system and life and the south Korean people can foil any oppressors' suppression and emerge victorious when they struggle united close under the banner of independence against the U.S. and democracy against dictatorship.
					
					The independence and democratization of the society were what those who fell in the above-said resistance ardently called for and this still remains the unanimous desire of all the south Koreans.
					
					The spirit of those who fell in the heroic resistance against the dictatorial forces forsaken by the people is still alive.
					
					The broad civic and public organizations and people of all strata in south Korea resolutely reject and denounce the anti-reunification forces hamstringing the efforts to improve the inter-Korean relations in league with foreign forces swimming against the trend of the era for independent reunification. They have the will to achieve without fail the reunification through alliance with the north by adhering to and implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					The banner to be held aloft by the Korean nation to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country is the above-said declarations. The independence, great unity and national reunification which all the Koreans desire are achievable only when the inter-Korean joint declarations are firmly preserved and sincerely implemented.
					
					Whoever is truly concerned about the destiny of the nation and desirous of national reunification should courageously turn out in the patriotic struggle for supporting and implementing the inter-Korean declarations.

articles.title: Intensified Anti-Imperialist Struggle Called for
articles.content:
Intensified Anti-Imperialist Struggle Called for
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Upholding the banner of the anti-imperialist struggle is one of the main guarantees for shattering the imperialists' moves for domination and continuing to dynamically push forward the popular masses' cause of independence. Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article.
					The human cause of independence, the cause for peace, is, in essence, a struggle to meet humankind's desire and requirement for independence and peace opposed to the imperialists and dominationists' subjugation and oppression, the article says, and goes on:
					
					What is important for waging a dynamic anti-imperialist struggle is to clearly understand the nature of imperialism and the inevitability of its downfall.
					
					Aggression and plunder are the mode of existence of the imperialists.
					
					The imperialists are cunning enough to change their methods of aggression depending on the changing international situation in a bid to attain their criminal aims.
					
					The imperialists' hypocritical peace offensive based on their strategy for world domination amounts to a factor of putting the world people's cause of independence, progress and peace at peril.
					
					All the peace-loving forces in the world should never be taken in by the imperialists' hypocritical talk about peace but heighten the vigilance against their moves for aggression and war and intensify the struggle against imperialism.
					
					The world progressives should not overlook any armed intervention and aggression by the imperialists but foil them with collective counteractions.
					
					The world progressives advocating independence should combat any slightest illusion and fear of imperialism and resolutely maintain the anti-imperialist independent stand.
					
					The world people should courageously turn out in the anti-imperialist struggle, well aware of the vulnerability of the modern imperialists who are bluffing and making last-ditch efforts before their doom and the inevitability of their downfall.
					
					The world progressive people can certainly bring imperialism to its doom and realize humankind's desire and wishes for peace when they intensify the anti-imperialist struggle in close unity, confident of the victory of the cause of independence.

articles.title: WPK Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
WPK Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Friendly meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows were held at the DPRK missions in Cuba, Nakhodka of Russia, Uganda, Nigeria, Guinea and Democratic Congo from Oct. 7 to 10 on the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					Displayed in the venues of the functions were works of the peerlessly great persons, photos introducing their immortal exploits and those showing the Korean people in their building of a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					Attending the functions were figures of all strata including the representatives of political parties of different countries permanently stationed in Cuba, officials of the Presidential Envoy Office to the Far East Federal District, Foreign Ministry Office in Vladivostok and the Maritime Territorial Committee of the Russian Youth Union, vice-mayors of Nakhodka and Artyom, representatives of the "United Russia" Party, the Maritime Territorial Regional Branch of the Communist Party and the Young Communist League of the Russian Federation, the senior adviser to Presidency of Uganda, the chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the Kampala City Committee of the Uganda National Resistance Movement, the chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the general secretary of the Party for Unity and Progress of Guinea, members of the leadership of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democr acy of Democratic Congo and the secretary general of the African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People.
					
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched Korean films including "Army of Korea" and "Reply of Korea".

articles.title: WPK Birthday Celebrated in Various Countries
articles.content:
WPK Birthday Celebrated in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A reading session was held in Democratic Congo, round-table talks in Poland and lectures in Iran and Indonesia from Oct. 5 to 9 on the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					Displayed in the venues of the functions were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, photos on their immortal party building leadership exploits and books and photos introducing the glorious course covered by the WPK for more than six decades.
					
					Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					The chairman of the National Executive Committee of the Polish Communist Party noted with appreciation that Kim Il Sung formed the Down-with-Imperialism Union in his early years after embarking on the road of revolution and thus provided the historical roots of building a revolutionary party. And then he built firm organizational backbone and laid solid mass foundation for the party building amidst the flames of the two decade-long arduous anti-Japanese revolution, the chairman added, stressing: After the liberation of Korea Kim Il Sung founded the WPK, thus carving out a new road of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence.
					
					The chairman of the Group for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea of Democratic Congo said that thanks to the wise leadership of the WPK with Kim Jong Il as its general secretary, the DPRK has made steady progress forward under the uplifted banner of socialism remaining undeterred despite whatever tempest.
					
					The vice-chairman of the International Relations Committee of the Iran Parties House introduced in detail the benevolent and all-embracing politics of Kim Jong Il, saying that the WPK has grown stronger to be the invincible militant party under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: WPK Birthday Observed in Britain
articles.content:
WPK Birthday Observed in Britain
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy released a joint statement on October 10 on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement referred to the great successes made by the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung and led by General Secretary Kim Jong Il on all fronts of socialist construction.
					
					 The WPK has achieved such great victory as the two successful nuclear tests that demonstrated the might of the DPRK to the world and dynamically pushed ahead with the implementation of the cause of independence against imperialism, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The WPK has achieved big victory at every phase of the revolution, guided by the Juche idea, and dealt telling blows at the imperialists and class enemies.
					
					 The example set by the WPK to be followed by all progressive political parties is the shining fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Juzef Lachut, chairman of the National Executive Committee of the Polish Communist Party, released a statement on October 10 on the occasion of the birthday of the WPK.

articles.title: DPRK Important Days Marked in Kuwait
articles.content:
DPRK Important Days Marked in Kuwait
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The Kuwaiti preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and the Kuwait-Korea Friendship Association jointly issued a special bulletin on Oct. 8 on the occasions of the 64th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and the second anniversary of the adoption of the October 4 declaration.
					The bulletin in an article gave a detailed account of the fact that the WPK has consistently pursued popular policies under the slogan "We serve the people!" enjoying the absolute support and trust of the popular masses.
					
					It referred in detail to the fact that the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, a milestone of national reunification, and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it, were provided.
					
					Under the wise leadership of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il, the Korean people have dynamically advanced the cause of the country's reunification while frustrating all sorts of challenges and obstructions of the separatist forces, the bulletin said, adding that the cause of national reunification is sure to be accomplished thanks to the independent stand maintained by him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Italy
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in pamphlet by the Italian branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work, published on Sept. 5, Juche 97 (2008), clarifies the idea that the 60 years long history of the DPRK is the great history of struggle and victory, the creation and change in which the Koreans defended independence and honor of the country and built a rich and prosperous socialist country standing the tempests of the revolution under the leadership of the great leader and party.
					
					 It also expounds the idea that even a small and backward country can become a developed and prestigious power when it is led by great leader and party.
					
					 The work also indicates the task and ways for accomplishing to the last the revolutionary cause of Juche under the banner of the Juche idea, the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported by British Associations
articles.content:
Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported by British Associations
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The British branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy issued a joint statement on October 3 on the occasions of the 29th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the second anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration.
					The statement said that the proposal for founding the DFRK advanced by President Kim Il Sung at the 6th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is the most realistic and fair and aboveboard proposal for terminating the division of Korea.
					
					 It went on:
					
					The proposal for founding the DFRK is being successfully materialized thanks to the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration in which the idea of "By our nation itself" is embodied.
					
					On the above-said occasions the statement demanded the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces pull out of south Korea at once and the south Korean authorities pull down the hateful barrier dividing Korea into the north and the south and accept the proposal for federation.

articles.title: Causa revolucionaria del Songun se inicio en la "UDI"
articles.content:
Causa revolucionaria del Songun se inicio en la "UDI"
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ATCC) -- La revolucion coreana es la sagrada que se inicio y avanzo bajo la bandera de la Union para Derrotar al Imperialismo ("UDI").
					En la decada de 1920 cuando el movimiento de liberacion nacional de Corea atravesaba un camino espinoso, el Presidente Kim Il Sung fundo la "UDI" partiendo de su firme conviccion de que es posible vencer solo con las armas al enemigo armado.
					
					Gracias a ese acontecimiento, fue echada la raiz del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC) y se inicio la revolucion del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					La "UDI" fue la primera organizacion de vanguardias revolucionarias que materializo la idea del Presidente de dar prioridad a las fuerzas armadas y su programa sirvio de base de partida de la causa revolucionaria del Songun que preparo el ideal fundamental y el principio de la revolucion basada en las fuerzas armadas.
					
					El Presidente, quien heredo de su padre la idea sobre la resistencia armada y dos pistolas y mantuvo firmemente la voluntad revolucionaria de salvar el destino del pais y la nacion con las fuerzas armadas, declaro la lucha de vida o muerte contra los imperialistas al fundar la "UDI".
					
					La organizacion de la "UDI" fue el primer paso de la causa historica para poner en practica la original idea de dar prioridad a las fuerzas armadas y la primera etapa de los preparativos para organizar un destacamento armado revolucionario.
					
					A medida que se ultimaban los preparativos de la lucha armada iniciados en la "UDI", el Presidente definio en la Conferencia de Kalun la linea de lucha armada como la estrategica de la revolucion coreana y fundo la Guerrilla Popular Antijaponesa en abril del 21 (1932) de la Era Juche dando inicio asi a la grandiosa historia de la revolucion del Songun.
					
					El ideal socialista presentado por la "UDI" devino el fundamental de la autoctona causa de la revolucion del Songun.
					
					Igualmente, el principio de la independencia, el antiimperialismo y la revolucion continua ha sido tambien el principio fundamental que garantizara firmemente el triunfo final de la revolucion.
					
					La historia del PTC coronada con la independencia y la prosperidad fue el proceso de lucha practica por materializar el ideal y el principio de la "UDI" bajo la bandera del Songun y todas las victorias y exitos logrados en este periodo resultaron las valiosas conquistas de tal ideal.
					
					Quedaran eternamente en los anales de la patria las grandes proezas de la "UDI" que al presentar y materializar la idea de dar importancia a las fuerzas armadas por primera vez en el proceso del cumplimiento de la causa de independencia de las masas populares, iluminaron el camino de la soberania, la independencia y la prosperidad del pais y la nacion y dieron inicio en el territorio patrio a la nueva historia de la gran potencia prospera socialista, que brilla con la politica de Songun.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena reciente lanzamiento de satelites por EE.UU.
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena reciente lanzamiento de satelites por EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ATCC) -- Segun trascendidos, los dos satelites militares lanzados recientemente por Estados Unidos daran al sistema antimisiles la capacidad de persecucion a escala mundial y los datos, que se transmiten desde los sensores instalados en ellos, se utilizaran en la interceptacion de los misiles por parte de las tropas norteamericanas.
					Esto demuestra que entra en la etapa practica el intento estrategico de EE.UU. de tomar la hegemonia militar y realizar con la fuerza su ambicion de dominar el mundo monopolizando el cosmos.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 16 y continua:
					
					Para ese fin, EE.UU. habla tanto de la "amenaza de misil" de alguien y la utiliza como pretexto para desplegar el sistema antimisiles en el espacio.
					
					El trata de seguir completando y ampliando unilateralmente el sistema antimisiles para neutralizar la capacidad y los medios de represalia de otras potencias y afianzar su heguemonia militar.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, emplaza abiertamente el sistema antimisiles en el cosmos para fines militares e impulsa en etapa crucial el desarrollo del satelite espacial dispuesto de misil antibalistico.
					
					Ahora cuando todo el mundo se esfuerza activamente por procurar el ambiente pacifico, EE.UU. se enfrasca en la carrera armamentista lanzando los satelites militares.
					
					Esto deviene un desafio frontal al deseo de la paz de la humanidad y acto criminal que amenaza y perturba gravemente la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
					
					EE.UU. no aspira a la paz y la seguridad del mundo sino persigue la agresion, la guerra y el enfrentamiento fisico.
					
					EE.UU. no podra justificar de ninguna manera sus maniobras en pro del aumento armamentista y la guerra de agresion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun conmemora 30 aniversario de resistencia de octubre
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun conmemora 30 aniversario de resistencia de octubre
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ATCC) -- En el articulo individual divulgado este viernes con motivo del aniversario 30 de la resistencia democratica de octubre de los jovenes, estudiantes y habitantes surcoreanos, el diario Rodong Sinmun la califico de justa lucha por acabar con la dominacion dictatorial de las fuerzas foraneas y sus lacayos y crear la nueva politica y nueva vida independientes y democraticas.
					Esta resistencia ha probado la verdad de la historia de que es infrenable la justa lucha de las masas populares aspirantes a la nueva politica, nuevo regimen y nueva vida y se puede frustrar cualquier campana represiva de los opresores y lograr la victoria si los habitantes surcoreanos luchan unidos firmemente como un solo hombre bajo la bandera de la independencia antiyanqui y la democratizacion antidictatorial, inicia el articulista y continua:
					
					La independencia y la democratizacion de la sociedad fueron lo que demandaban con ansiedad los martires de la resistencia democratica de octubre y siguen siendo hoy el unanime deseo de toda la poblacion surcoreana.
					
					Todavia esta vivo el espiritu de aquellos martires que se rebelaron rotundamente a las fuerzas dictatoriales que dieron espaldas al pueblo.
					
					Las entidades civiles y sociales y los habitantes de distintas capas del Sur de Corea rechazan categoricamente las maquinaciones de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion, que se oponen al mejoramiento de las relaciones Norte-Sur en confabulacion con las fuerzas extranjeras desafiando a la corriente de la epoca de reunificacion independiente, y estan firmemente decididos a lograr a toda costa la reunificacion en alianza con el Norte manteniendo e implementando la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					Estas declaraciones son la bandera que la nacion coreana debe enarbolar para lograr la reunificacion independiente y pacifica de la patria. Defender y mantener firmemente las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y ejecutarlas sinceramente, he aqui la independencia, la gran unidad y la reunificacion de la patria que desea la nacion coreana.
					
					Todas las personas que esten preocupadas de veras por el destino de la nacion y deseen la reunificacion de la patria, deben levantarse con valentia en la lucha patriotica por apoyar y ejecutar las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur.

articles.title: Paz mundial depende de la lucha antiimperialista
articles.content:
Paz mundial depende de la lucha antiimperialista
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ATCC) -- Enarbolar en alto la bandera de la lucha antiimperialista es una de las garantias fundamentales para frustrar las maniobras dominacionistas de los imperialistas e impulsar de continuo la causa de la independencia de las masas populares.
					Asi senala el rotativo Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este viernes y continua:
					
					La causa de la independencia, o sea, la de la paz de la humanidad es, en su esencia, la lucha contra la subyugacion y la opresion de los imperialistas y otros dominacionistas y por realizar la aspiracion y demanda independiente y pacifica de la humanidad.
					
					Lo mas importante en la dinamica lucha antiimperialista es conocer correctamente la naturaleza del imperialismo y la inevitabilidad de su derrota.
					
					El modo de existencia del imperialismo es la agresion y el saqueo.
					
					Los imperialistas cambian astutamente el metodo de agresion conforme a la situacion internacional dada para realizar su objeto criminal.
					
					La ofensiva de "paz" de los imperialistas basada en la estrategia de heguemonia mundial constituye un factor que amenaza la independencia, el progreso y la causa de la paz de los pueblos del mundo.
					
					Todas las fuerzas del mundo amantes de la paz no deben ser enganadas por la charlataneria de la seuda paz de los imperialistas sino deben elevar alta vigilancia sobre las maniobras de la agresion y la guerra de ellos y librar energicamente la lucha contra el imperialismo.
					
					Los pueblos progresistas del mundo que abogan por la independencia no deben tolerar ninguna intervencion armada ni la agresion de los imperialistas sino frustrarlas con el contraataque colectivo. Deben rechazar la ilusion y el panico sobre el imperialismo y mantener con firmeza la posicion independiente antiimperialista. 
					
					Los pueblos del mundo tienen que saber correctamente la fragilidad y la inevitabilidad de derrota de los imperialistas contemporaneos que se vanaglorian y actuan perversamente en visperas de su derrota y levantarse con valentia en la lucha antiimperialista.
					
					Deben unirse compactamente confiando en la victoria de la causa de la independencia e intensificar la lucha antiimperialista. He aqui la via para derrotar con certeza al imperialismo y realizar el deseo y la aspiracion de la humanidad a la paz.
